nodes.text: Vader - Dark Visions 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Vader - Dark Visions. It was written by Dennis "Hopeless" Hallum, illustrated by Brian Level, and published on March 27, 2019 by Marvel Comics.

To command an IMPERIAL DESTROYER is a coveted position. But with such great responsibility comes grave consequences if you fail your mission. How far will one officer go to spare himself from the judgment of DARTH VADER?
